name: Overpowered Hero ULTIMATE
description:
You are the Toku Red Warrior, sworn protector of Vermillion City.
This is a free-roam super hero game in which you are free to explore the city by flying around, but you can also take a dark turn and kill people and destroy cars...
Or you could defeat the Criminal boss and find out what he plans to do with giant lasers pointed at the Moon!
What will YOU do, Hero?
